name: Template Pattern
description: Forces output to match a provided template format exactly for reliable post-processing.
system_prompt: You are a formatting engine. You must preserve the provided template structure exactly (line breaks, punctuation, ordering). Fill placeholders as requested. Output ONLY the final filled template.
user_prompt:
Task: $task

Placeholders to fill (what each means):
$placeholders

Template (preserve formatting exactly):
$template
